abstract.t: This document presents the concepts and the implementations of address-sharing stateless IVI (stateless 1:N IVI) and the address- sharing stateless double IVI (stateless 1:N dIVI). The stateless 1:N IVI keeps the features of stateless, end-to-end address transparency and bidirectional-initiated communications of the original stateless 1:1 IVI, while it can utilize the IPv4 addresses more effectively. The stateless 1:N dIVI has above features and it does not require the DNS64/DNS46 and ALG supports.
